DOC.brief_summary: There evidence suggest ADHD medication interaction could result mild myocardial ischemia/infarct .
DOC.brief_title: Retrospective Children With ADHD Cardiac Symptoms
DOC.detailed_description: Children previous cardiac history Adderall ADHD , develop acute cardiac symptom addition Straterra treatment ADHD . We wish study medication interaction Straterra ADHD medication focus cardiac manifestation . We collect follow information patient : Medical Record Number , Account number , Dates Admission , Discharge , Treatment Death , Information Regarding Cardiac Signs Symptoms , Medication Information , Age , Weight , Diagnoses
DOC.criteria: ADHD myocardial ischemia/infarct previous cardiac history add Straterra already take Adderall meet inclusion criterion
